guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Indicate a Potential Impact on Safety or Response]: Simvastatin - SLCO1B1

relatedGenes.name: solute carrier organic anion transporter family member 1B1

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166315422
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: SLCO1B1 521 TC or 521 CC (intermediate or poor function transporters)

text.html: "Results in higher systemic concentrations and higher adverse reaction risk (myopathy). The risk of adverse reaction (myopathy) is higher for patients on 80 mg than for those on lower doses."
